author: Lee White
comment: The watch face keeps crashing on me every 10 sec. I finally had to delete the face and reinstall but it is doing the same thing.

reply.author: Евгений Суворов
reply.content: Hi, without knowing details I cannot help you. On my Sony Smartwatch 3 with latest firmware I was unable to get a single crash for months, and I actually use this as a daily face. If you want problem resolved, then report use case to the support e-mail.

title: Like the design
